name: Ahmet Abdi
body:
## About Me
Hi, I am Ahmet Abdi. I use the code name ```greenarrow``` on the internet if you ever come across me on IRC. I am currently a 21 year old student at Kingston University (London) studying computer science in my final year. My main area of interest is Ruby and Rails applications.
 
## Education
**Kingston University, London (2009 - 2013)** - Computer Science (BSc Honours Expected 2:1 to 1st).
 
**Coombe Sixth Form, Surrey (2007 - 2009)** - 3 A' levels in Media Studies, I.C.T and Business Studies.
 
**Raynes Park High School, London (2002 – 2007)** - 11 GCSE’s including Double English, Maths, Double Science.
 
## Work Experience
 
### Software Engineer, DAI (June 2011 – June 2012)
During my third year at University I did a placement with Digital Applications International (DAI), working as a software engineer at their Watford office. 

I worked on two internal RoR projects, the first was a time management system where workers at DAI would log their hours and overtime which would be used to calculate pay. The second was a customer relations management system (CRM) which held all interactions with potential customer’s and also stored a list of opportunities.

I also worked on project’s using there Matflo framework in C some of these include: 
Unilever, Selfridges, Dansk Supermarket (DSG), Tesco and Screw Fix.

Skills include: Ruby, Rails, C, Javascript, Haml, Sass, jQuery, CSS, HTML, Selenium, TDD, RSpec, Cucumber, Agile, Pair Programming.
 
## Personal Details
I'm on IRC 24/7.  
I love Ruby on Rails.  
I hold a full clean UK driver's license.

## Contact Me
IRC: greenarrow on ```#lrug```, ```#Ruby``` and ```#RubyonRails``` - on Freenode  
Email: ahmetabdi@gmail.com  
Skype: ahmetabdi
 
## Find me online
* [GitHub](https://github.com/ahmetabdi)  
* [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/users/829683/ahmet)
